p: The activity of Lippia berlandieri has been assessed on protozoans. In vitro treatment of Giardia intestinalis trophozoites with oregano extracts in ethanol [ 117] or in water [ 118] causes irreversible structural damage to the nucleoskeleton. This antiparasitic activity was more potent than tinidazole, a traditional giardiasis drug. The essential oils of Lippia spp. have been evaluated in a wide range of biological contexts in traditional medicine [ 119].
